Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供 DeviceSpecific/Choice 构造中的单个选择。

span.span: Provides a single choice within a DeviceSpecific/Choice construct.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是类似于[\<选择 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素。This class is analogous to the [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element. 选择测试中显示的顺序[ \](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)元素。Choices are tested in the order that they appear within a [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element. 如果指定的属性``元素，其值必须为设备筛选器中定义的名称``Machine.config 文件的部分。If you specify the property of the `` element, its value must be the name of a device filter defined in the `` section of the Machine.config file. 在运行时，ASP.NET 的计算结果将指定的设备筛选器与当前的设备的功能。At run time, ASP.NET evaluates the specified device filter against the capabilities of the current device. 如果成功，将选择该选项。If successful, the choice is selected. 如果未指定属性，则默认为``选择元素。If you do not specify the property, the defaults for the `` element are selected. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示``对映像中的元素。The following code example shows a `` element within an image. `Source`特性重写属性的控件。The `Source` attribute overrides the property of the control. 尽管该示例使用函数来确定浏览器是否要求 WML (`isWML11`)，也支持颜色 (`supportsColor`)，而是可以使用 Web.config 文件来定义``.NET Framework 自动用于使元素为你的决定。Although the example uses functions to determine whether the browser requires WML (`isWML11`) or supports color (`supportsColor`), you can instead use a Web.config file to define a `` element that the .NET Framework automatically uses to make the determination for you. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果筛选器是比较筛选器的值代替在 Web.config 中定义的参数值。如果的值是一种方法的名称 (在页上或关闭中指向 Web.config 的程序集)，值的作为该方法的参数提供。If the filter is a comparison filter, the value of is used in place of the argument value defined in Web.config. If the value of is the name of a method (either on the page or off in an assembly pointed to by Web.config), the value of is supplied as an argument to that method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写的属性处理之后更改此集合 (在方法) 不起作用。Changing this collection after overridden properties have been processed (in the method) has no effect. 此方法主要由控件设计器并不适合常规使用。This method is used primarily by control designers and is not intended for general use.

summary.span: 获取或设置设备筛选器的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a device filter.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The name of a device filter.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 筛选器名称必须在页上，在关联方法的名称`.ascx`中的文件或有效的设备筛选器的名称定义``Web.config 节。如果使用指定方法名称属性，该方法必须符合以下原型。The filter name must be the name of a method on the page, in the associated `.ascx` file, or the name of a valid device filter defined in the `` section of Web.config. If a method name is specified with the property, that method must match the following prototype. ``` public bool methodName(System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities capabilities, String optionalArgument) ``` 例如，如果属性设置为`myChoiceMethod`，具有以下签名的方法必须存在。For example, if the property was set to `myChoiceMethod`, a method with the following signature must exist. ``` public bool myChoiceMethod(System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities capabilities, String optionalArgument); ``` 评估时[\<选择 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素，则进行检查以确定在页上是否存在适当的签名的方法。When evaluating the [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element, a check is made to determine whether a method of the appropriate signature exists on the page. 如果不是，ASP.NET 检查``Web.config 节。If not, ASP.NET checks the `` section of Web.config. > [!NOTE] > 设备筛选器是区分大小写。Device filters are case-sensitive.
